org.atmosphere.websocket

Interface WebSocketPingPongListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultWebSocketProcessor

    public interface WebSocketPingPongListener
    WebSocket Ping/Pong Listener. Use this interface with WebSocketProcessor or WebSocketHandler or WebSocketStreamingHandler
    Author:
    Jeanfrancois Arcand
